description: The Budget decreased TEMPORARILY by USD$500,000 including AOS as per the written approval from Mr. Andrea Tamagnini to meet the Donor request to make funds avaliable for another project PAL99J21 ATLAs no. 00030904

subproject.corporate outcome: Expansion and access to financial services for the poor, employment and income generation and access to markets, goods and services.
subproject.description: a projects containing two components.  one part for upgrading water systems in Jericho city in ein el sultan and the other is constructing a telecontrol for regulating water pressure in hebron city through the hebron municipality through a control panel.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: JERICHO & HEBRON WATER
